title: 搜索页面出现403问题
author: 天过风晴
txt_content:
问题很简单，我用搜索，然后出现的页面是403，出现文字 403 Forbidden
You don't have permission to access the URL on this server. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please report this message and include the following information to us.
Thank you very much!

URL:        http://www.mcbbs.net/search.php?searchsubmit=yes
Server:        tx-gz-mcbbs-prod-6
Date:        2020/03/23 15:11:09
Powered by Tengine 
请问这个怎么解决

replies.author: 坑触可
replies.txt_content: 泥潭被打，全站搜索限制10次数/分钟

replies.author: 星层
replies.txt_content:
坑触可 发表于 2020-3-23 15:47
泥潭被打，全站搜索限制10次数/分钟
不，这个实际上不知道为什么每次搜索完不管点什么都会变成这样

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content:
403的问题我们还在解决中，目前的话先暂时用到百度站内搜索吧
百度里搜的关键词加上 site:www.mcbbs.net 即可
比如：
暮色 site:www.mcbbs.net
